snippet: The Federal Reserve chairman Ben S. Bernanke defended the central bank’s latest monetary policy on Sunday from claims that it was hurting the economies of emerging countries.
abstract: Federal Reserve chairman Ben S Bernanke defends central bank’s latest monetary policy from claims it is hurting economies of emerging countries; says stronger growth in the United States bolsters global prospects as well.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve chairman Ben S. Bernanke defended the central bank’s latest monetary policy on Sunday from claims that it was hurting the economies of emerging countries.

headline.seo: Bernanke Defends Fed From Claims It Is Being Selfish
headline.main: Bernanke Says Fed Policy Could Benefit Global Economy
headline.print_headline: Bernanke Says the Fed’s Latest Monetary Policy Could Benefit the Global Economy
